about_the_game:
Bike Baron 2 is a wild motorbike racer built for time attack. It blends physics-based gameplay, pixel-perfect controls, and mad level design into a game that lives from all the faceplants, uncountable retries, and relentless breaking of records.

The path to the new record is simple. You hit a section, and try to improve it.

Land too far.
Crash.
A little out of balance.

Forty attempts later, you're consistently two tenths faster. Do the same for the last loop in the level, then string it all together for a time that—by some small miracle—ends up just under 37 seconds. That's #4 overall. And there's still that early section to work on!

This game is perfect for those who just know they can squeeze one tiny fraction more out of their run.

  • Four tracks available in this demo, varying in difficulty, style, and pacing, each 30-90 seconds in length, some of them quite outrageous.
  • Ghost runs. Not only to know how fast you're going in comparison, but also to get a look at how others are making their records.
  • Leaderboards. See where you stand in a competition between friends or—if you're that good—among the world elite at the very top of the standings.

Grab your helmet and let's start breaking records!
